ComicInfo.Summary:
America's desperate gamble yields a victory, but a pyrrhic one given the vast cost in lives. Gillen's brilliant revision of WW2 history continues!
Available with Regular, Wraparound, War Crimes, Propaganda and Blitzkrieg covers by series artist Daniel Gete and a limited VIP Premium cover by Gabriel Andrade that is limited to 500 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------|-------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Daniel Gete | 1 | | WC | Wraparound Cover | Daniel Gete | 2 | | BC | Blitzkrieg Cover | Daniel Gete | 3 | | PPC | Propaganda Poster Cover | Michael DiPascale | 4 | | WC | War Crimes Cover | Daniel Gete | 5 | | VIP | VIP Premium Cover, Limited to 500 | Gabriel Andrade | 6 |
Notes:
The Propaganda Poster cover is a homage of the World War I recruiting poster.
